ComicInfo.Title: Alice
ComicInfo.Summary: Wonderland never lets go easily! Grimm Fairy Tales presents Tales from Wonderland: Alice, the first in a series of 3 one-shot prequels that will offer insight into the madness of the terrifying realm. Before Calie's nightmare journey, before Johnny's decent into madness, before the horror that tore a family apart, there was a child named Alice who entered a foreign world only to return forever changed. Her sanity would be taken, but her life would not be wasted. Witness the story of the girl who lost everything only to become an unlikely hero. Also features the final 8-page back up story that will reveal the true origin and discovery of the world known only as Wonderland.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-15 21:20:00. [CVDB178503]
ComicInfo.Writer: Raven Gregory, Joe Brusha, Ralph Tedesco
ComicInfo.Penciller: Daniel Leister, Vic Drujiniu, Daniel Leister, Vic Drujiniu
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al√© Garza, Blond, David Nakayama, Nei Ruffino
ComicInfo.Characters: Alice Liddle, Calie Liddle, Charles Dodgson, Cheshire Cat, Henry Allen, Jabberwocky, Lewis Liddle, Mad Hatter, Red Queen, White Rabbit
